Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells using non-glass sealants have become increasingly common.
Titulo: Comparison of infiltrated ceramic fiber paper and mica base compressive seals for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this paper, fumed silica infiltrated ceramic fiber paper with pre-compression was compared with plain and pre-compressed at 10 MPa hybrid mica as compressive seals.
Titulo: Comparison of infiltrated ceramic fiber paper and mica base compressive seals for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Leakage tests were measured under a 0.1-1.0 MPa compressive load with the pressure gradient varying from 2 to 15 kPa.
Titulo: Comparison of infiltrated ceramic fiber paper and mica base compressive seals for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results demonstrated that the leakage rate of infiltrated fiber paper was 0.04 scan cm(-1) for a 10 kPa gradient, under 1.0 MPa compressive load, while for mica it was 0.60 and 0.63 sccm cm(-1) which indicated that the infiltrated ceramic fiber paper showed a much lower leakage than mica.
Titulo: Comparison of infiltrated ceramic fiber paper and mica base compressive seals for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Long-term thermal cycling tests demonstrated that although the leakage of fumed silica infiltrated fiber paper was slightly higher than that of hybrid mica, it remained stable after 20 thermal cycles and no interlayer was needed.
Titulo: Comparison of infiltrated ceramic fiber paper and mica base compressive seals for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The mass loss of the fiber paper was 1.7 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Comparison of infiltrated ceramic fiber paper and mica base compressive seals for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: mg cm(-2) h(-1) in a hydrogen environment at 1073 K for 200 h.
Titulo: Comparison of infiltrated ceramic fiber paper and mica base compressive seals for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The leakage of infiltrated fiber paper remained about 0.06 sccm cm(-1) after reduction.
Titulo: Comparison of infiltrated ceramic fiber paper and mica base compressive seals for planar solid oxide fuel cells
